sys_transform_map.name: Import Historic NeedIt Data

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_7574ed2c1b07011081868623604bcb36
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	// Add your code here
	// If the source data does not have a u_requested_for_email field, 
  // create the target email address from the Requested for value.  Email addresses 
  // have the format firstname.lastname@example.com.  Convert the u_requested_for 
  // value to lowercase.  Replace the space with a . and concatenate with 
  // @example.com
  if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){
    var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
    target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
  }
  
	var sdate = new GlideDateTime(source.u_must_have_by); 
	sdate.info(sdate.getByFormat("MM-dd-yyyy"));
	target.u_when_needed = sdate.getDisplayValue(); 
 

})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>imp_computer</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-20 19:27:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>7574ed2c1b07011081868623604bcb36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_7574ed2c1b07011081868623604bcb36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-20 20:24:29</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
